engine
Class Partition

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--engine.Partition
public class Partition
extends java.lang.Object

Partition - creates a partition in 3-dimensional space. Partitions can only be initialized once; however, many instances of partitions can be made. All partitions are immutable and sets of partitions correspond to the flyweight design described in any design text.

Author:
Ragu Vijaykumar

Parameters:
origin - - origin of the playing space
upper - - strictly upper corner of the playing space
Returns:

getBlocks

public java.util.Set getBlocks(javax.media.j3d.BoundingBox container,
                               java.util.Set blocks)
Returns a set of blocks that are contained within the container

Parameters:
container - - space to query against for partitions
blocks - - collection to be appended to; if null, then a new set will be returned
Returns:
set of blocks that are contained within the container and max spatial area
